name: Samsung Refrigerator
description: Large stainless steel Samsung refrigerator with french doors and bottom freezer. Great condition, barely used for 2 years. Energy efficient with ice maker and water dispenser.

name: Bosch Dishwasher
description: High-quality Bosch dishwasher with stainless steel interior. Very quiet operation and excellent cleaning performance. Perfect for small to medium families.

name: West Elm Dining Table
description: Beautiful solid wood dining table from West Elm. Seats 6 people comfortably. Minor scratches but overall in great condition. Perfect for a new home.

name: IKEA KALLAX Bookshelf
description: White KALLAX 4x4 bookshelf unit with some storage boxes included. Great for organizing books, decorative items, or storage. Easy to assemble and move.

name: LG Washer & Dryer Set
description: Matching LG front-loading washer and dryer set. Energy efficient and high capacity. Perfect for families. Includes all necessary hoses and connections.

specifications.capacity: 4.5 cu ft washer, 7.4 cu ft dryer

name: Sony 55" 4K TV
description: Sony Bravia 55-inch 4K HDR Smart TV. Excellent picture quality with vibrant colors. Includes original remote and stand. Wall mount bracket included.

name: Queen Mattress & Box Spring
description: Comfortable queen-size mattress with matching box spring. Medium-firm support, great for back health. Clean and well-maintained. 3 years old.

name: Kitchen Island Cart
description: Mobile kitchen island with butcher block top and storage underneath. Perfect for extra counter space and storage. Wheels lock in place.
